extendedInfo.description: Pixel Media Renderer is "UPNP/DLNA" compatible Digital Media Renderer on Android Platform (SmartPhone, Tablet, STB/TV & Android Player). It renders digital media contents, such as Images (JPEG), Songs (MP3, WAVE, 3GP, etc.), and Videos (AVI, MP4, MKV, FLV, TS etc.) from âUPnP/DLNAâ compliant Digital Media Server (DMS) using Digital Media Controller (DMC). Pixel Media Render (PixelDMR) enables android devices to act as SmartTV!Pixel Media Renderer (Pixel DMR) can be discovered from home network using Digital Media Controller (DMC). User can play back digital media contents (Image, Songs & Video) which are shared on DMS using DMC at Pixel Media Renderer.This solution makes your android device to become Digital Media Renderer device and enjoy the latest convergence technology at your finger touch.Features:*	"UPNP/DLNA" Compatible Digital Media Renderer for Android Platform*	Support SSDP protocol for DMR discovery*	On screen message for WiFi on/off*	Support WiFi/Ethernet/Tethering*	Support JPEG image preview using own implementation Image Viewer*	Support Audio Playback (MP3, MP4, 3GP, MID, WAV file format) using own implementation Audio Viewer*	Support Video Playback using 3rd party Video Player (MX Player, DicePlayer, VLC etc.)* 	Audio Control :  VolumeUP, VolumeDown, Mute/Unmute *	Audio Playback: Stop, Pause, Play*	Video Playback: Stop, Start (Does not support Seek and Pause for Video Playback)*	Support Android OS from 2.3 to latest Jellybean (4.2) and support all android screen resolution (small to xlarge) and app support Landscape mode for Image, Audio & Video preview.* 	Small app footprint and 24x7 support from developer for any feedback and queriesPixel Media Render is tested with all popular DMC app on android platform and DMS available on Android, Windows, Linux and Embedded Linux Platform. Our Recommended DMC is âPixel Media Controller - DLNAâ on android platform and âPixel DMCâ on iOS platform and recommended DMS is âPixel Media Server â DLNA DMSâ on android platform.Please provide your valuable feedback on Pixel Media Render (v 1.8).For any queries or issue related to Pixel Media Render, please send e-mail to   android@cmcltd.comWe are happy to help you.Disclaimer: This app is not DLNA certified solution and this app is not claiming that "App has passed interoperability testing standards approved, endorsed or sponsored by DLNA". This application is not certified by DLNA Organization (www.dlna.org) or its associate partner and we are not listed Member Company of this organization. DLNAÂ® is trade mark of DLNA Organization.TAG: DLNA, DMS, VIDEO, Player, DMR, DMC, Media Server, Remote Controller, Renderer, TV, Pixel-DMR, Pixel DMR, Pixel DMS, Pixel Media

reviews.title: Cool!
reviews.comment: Great idea! Like!
reviews.author: Lino Lino

reviews.title: Seems to work pretty well.
reviews.comment: Done some brief testing and seems to work well as a UPNP renderer.  I don\'t know of any other Android app that can do what this app does.  It is a UPNP renderer.  It has no interface with buttons. You just run it and it appears on your network as a DLNA/UPNP renderer.  Which is just what I need.
reviews.author: chris r

reviews.title: Great app, works perfectly fine
reviews.comment: I dont know why people say it dont work, may be they dont know about the DMR technology. I want to say, it works very well with Pixel Media Controller and MediaHouse apps which are acting as media controller for me. I have installed this app to my tablet and android mini tv box which are runing on android os 4.1. App perfectly playing media content from my DMS and able to control from DMC.
reviews.author: Komia Natasu

reviews.title: Works..
reviews.comment: It works fine at my device and my home setup as per its feature list. Very cool and add free app. I am using diceplayer as default video player. Perfect app for PixelDMC and MediaHouse.Thanks!
reviews.author: Alex Bendon

reviews.title: Pixel Media Renderer from CMC Limited
reviews.comment: If you have any issue, please send us an email to android@cmcltd.com. This app requires two more dlna components; DMS and DMC in your home network. DMS, DMR and DMC need to be in a same home netwotk. DMC will be acting as a remote to browse a media file from DMS and playback to DMR and controlling PixelDMR.
reviews.author: Sumanto Banerjee

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I am unable to move from first screen on galaxy S advance
reviews.author: Aditya Adusumalli

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.comment: I was looking for a true dlna media renderer app for my android mini tv player, so I can play back my NAS content to it using my pre-install DMC app at my android tablet.  I am very much satisfied. Nothing more to say. Now I am true lover of dlna technology. Thanks to developer!
reviews.author: Rubia Posru

reviews.comment: Installed, shows the three icons on the home screen and then does nothing.  Quick to install......just as quickly removed
